channel.title: [#1 On RsWebs] Project Optimum - #1 PK Source [Working Korasi Spec]
channel.description:
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/ndnays.png[/img]
Current #1 on the RsWebs Toplist! The best PKing server you will ever play!
Thanks for 150+ Downloads over the weekend!
The ultimate PK source :-
Fast and active PKing. Great donator benefits such as overloads and Spec restore. Commands such as ::master and ::pure for quick level changes Commands such as ::melee and ::mage for instant gear setup. Nex with full animations. Corp with full animations. Jad to get a firecape. Nomad as an extra challenge. FFA Minigame. PK Titles to show how good you are ::item to allow different styles of pking. And so much more!!
Download Link : [url=http://up.ht/Wi7caL] CLICK HERE.[/url]
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2uyq0rm.jpg[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2n1ffkp.jpg[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/34nnvau.jpg[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/t6ds3c.jpg[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2ir9rhi.jpg[/img] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/f1ifa.jpg[/img] [img]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/4067/4b7ddc9a5e294c7a83fee5c.png[/img] [img]http://img838.imageshack.us/img838/4184/a68bbc5968da45cba3daee9.png[/img] [img]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/1661/93d804af55a94263a76c788.png[/img]
[quote="PvPXile"][code]@echo off color c title Initialiser "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code]
Theres a quick bit of code for run.bat, wrote it on the spot so post any errors. If you can't read, I stopped it from trying to read jrebel so delete all of the jrebel files.[/quote]

item.title: [#1 On RsWebs] Project Optimum - #1 PK Source [Working Korasi Spec]
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[quote=“PvPXile, post:35, topic:466377”]Project Optimum Edits

Run.bat (Server sided)

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

This is disabling jrebel, therefore you can delete the jrebel files and errors. Change the JDK Directory.

Compiler.bat (Server Sided)

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\players\pvp\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src\server\clip\*.java src\server\clip\region\*.java pause

This is the correct compiler code, this will fix the errors. Change the JDK Directory.

Information

This is based off of Vistex V7 which is based from Xyle.

Changing the IP adress. (Putting your server online)

Navigate to Server>src>server>model>players>client.java

Open up client.java and search for server =

Change this to 127.0.0.1 or your NO-IP Adress.

Navigate to server>src>server>server.java

Open up server.java and search for

Scroll down and you will see

Change the whole of that line (line 140) to

Change “yourserverip” to your server IP.

OP:Feel free to post this onto the main thread, with credits please.[/quote]
Lol, would just like to point out you have the wrong client Class, you change the IP in the client Class in your client src folder, not the server src.

Read full topic
item.source: [#1 On RsWebs] Project Optimum - #1 PK Source [Working Korasi Spec]

item.dc:creator: @Mini_Guy_123 Mini Guy 123
item.description:
@Mini_Guy_123 wrote:

[quote=“Master CoderZ, post:27, topic:466377”]@echo off
title Vistex
color a
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe” -Xmx1024m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; -noverify -javaagent:“C:\jrebel.jar” server.Server
pause

Paste The Jrebel Into your C Drive and Compile then Run Post errors below[/quote]

You could just change to location in the .bat
